name: PATTERNS
description: The PATTERNS table contains information about stored Patterns that can be used to create schedule templates for providers.

columns.name: PATTERN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID number of the pattern record used to create a provider's schedule.

columns.name: PATTERN_ID_PATTERN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the pattern record used to create a provider's schedule.

columns.name: PATTERN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the pattern record used to create a provider's schedule.
